source:
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The guard quartermaster seems a bit overwhelmed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
L'officier de la logistique de Fort Jobb semble avoir besoin d'aide.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_00<tab>Discuter avec l'officier de la logistique, à la halte nord

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_01<tab>Search for usable supplies at the Northern Staging Point.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_01<tab>Faire le tour de la halte nord et jeter un œil sur les ressources disponibles

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the knobbly cane to the guard quartermaster.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_02<tab>Remettre le <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8FA60202 /var> à l'officier de la logistique
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_03<tab>Parler à l'officier de la logistique, à Fort Jobb

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_000<tab>I hate to be abrupt, but─can you help me?
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_000<tab>Vous... Vous ne seriez pas l<var 08 E905 ((a)) ((e)) /var> voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var> qui nous a prêté main-forte pendant la bataille de Holminster<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_001<tab>Thank y─ Oh goodness, it's you! The one who turned the tide at Holminster Switch! Well, I feel doubly bad about this now, but I have little choice. I need any help that I can get.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_001<tab>Oh, j'en étais sûre<var 1D /var>! Votre aide nous a été très précieuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_100_001<tab>Thanks to the eaters, everything not in ruins is in disarray, and I'm working to determine what materiel we have, but that requires sifting through it all! And if I don't know what we <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> it will be fruitless, as I won't be able to order, and─
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_100_001<tab>Je-je suis vraiment désolée de vous demander ça, mais pourriez-vous me rendre un service<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_002<tab>Ahem. In short, I need you to meet me at the Northern Staging Point. Please.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_002<tab>Pour pouvoir établir une estimation des ressources nécessaires à la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de Holminster, j'aurais besoin de l'avis de quelqu'un qui était présent pendant l'attaque... Je vous attends à la halte nord.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_010<tab>We'll be assessing the situation out here. Though it may save time if you were to first tell me what destruction you personally witnessed?
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_010<tab>Merci d'avoir fait la route jusqu'ici<var 1D /var>! Je vous écoute, que pouvez-vous me dire sur l'état actuel de Holminster<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_011<tab>Many structures burned or otherwise damaged in the fighting... Yes, I thought as much. I may look into procuring tents so that the laborers come to assist in the reconstruction need not journey back and forth each day─that ought to save time.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_011<tab>Je vois, la plupart des bâtiments ont donc été détruits ou calcinés... Ce qui veut dire qu'il faudra pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment prévoir des tentes pour loger les ouvriers.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_012<tab>I'd be curious to know whether anything out here actually has survived. Might I ask you to survey the northern area and tell me if you find any materiel or other supplies that might still be fit for use?
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_012<tab>Pouvez-vous jeter un œil aux alentours et me ramener ce qui vous semble utile<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_013<tab>Thank you. Please meet me here when you've finished.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_013<tab>Je vous attends ici, prenez votre temps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You pick up the cane, and see that it has been weathered by what must have been many years of use.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Il y a un bâton usé au sol. Probablement perdu par un berger de Holminster pendant l'attaque.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>You peer into the crate to find that it, fortuitously, contains several undamaged tents.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Ces boîtes contiennent chacune une tente, elles seront sûrement utiles.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>You examine the rack, and notice that many of the weapons that remain are, as yet, undamaged.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Il n'y a rien d'autre que des armes ici. Des outils seraient plus utiles aux ouvriers.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_030<tab>Finished your inspection, have you? What did you find?
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_030<tab>Oh, vous avez fait vite<var 1D /var>! Avez-vous pu trouver quelque chose d'intéressant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_031<tab>Oh, shepherds around here use this sort of cane. It must belong to one of the residents. Or former residents, now, I suppose...
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_031<tab>C'est pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment un berger de Holminster qui l'a fait tomber pendant sa fuite... Il était pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment en plein travail lorsque l'attaque a eu lieu.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_032<tab>We can return it to them, though I imagine they'd rather have their land and livestock back. What else was there?

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_033<tab>Good to hear that I shouldn't need to procure any fresh tents. The weapons are less immediately useful, though I will of course have them collected. It seems that I'll primarily need to order tools, as there were none to be found in the areas I checked, either.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_033<tab>Si je comprends bien, nous n'aurons pas de problèmes pour trouver des tentes, mais nous allons manquer d'outils...

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_034<tab>I very much appreciate your help─this has gone much more swiftly for your presence. Would you accept a small reward? I have a bit of coin stored for just such an occasion back at the fort.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_034<tab>Je savais que votre aide me serait précieuse<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>! Retournons à Fort Jobb, pour que je vous remette votre récompense.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_040<tab>And now the real work begins. Fighting off the sin eaters was no small feat, but the task of rebuilding seems almost more daunting.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_040<tab>Je tenais à nouveau à vous remercier pour votre aide. Le grand purgateur a été vaincu, mais le combat continue pour les réfugiés... Il faut vite qu'ils puissent retrouver leur village pour reprendre des vies normales.

source: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_041<tab>Nothing for it but to grit our teeth and get to it, however. For the sake of everyone in Lakeland.
target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_041<tab>Acceptez ceci en échange de votre aide, voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var>. À bientôt<var 1D /var>!
